channel.title: Auto Server Restarter [CODER NEEDED]
channel.description:
I didn't know what to search for so can someone make me a code that restarts the server ever hour and warns them to log out 1 minute before it does?
Also, I couldn't find any clear tutorials on adding Auto Save to TestScape so that would be nice too.
TestScape Thanks -Ryu Hitokiri
